sense.name: difference of opinion
sense.commentary: DISPUTE[+event] A conflict, disagreement, or argument.
sense.examples: The dispute between John and Mary lasted three weeks. The issue of gun control initiated an ongoing dispute between the parties. He had a minor dispute with his wife. I took the dispute to court.

sense.name: being in dispute
sense.commentary: DISPUTE[+event] The quality of being disputed. Used mainly in the expression "in dispute".
sense.examples: The only issue in dispute is where John should go to school.
